entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: ESE 35 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
